title: Tonga tsunami sparks 'unprecedented disaster', government says
content:
1. Tonga tsunami sparks 'unprecedented disaster', government says  BBC News
  2. First images of Tonga volcano damage show entire communities covered in thick ash  CNN
  3. Undersea cable fault could cut off Tonga from rest of the world for weeks  Yahoo Finance
  4. Tonga tsunami cuts off nearly all island communications - BBC News  BBC News
  5. After Tonga's Volcano Eruption, Worries Grow About Covid Exposure  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: トンガの津波は「未曾有の災害」を引き起こした、と政府は発表した。
政府称汤加海啸引发 "史无前例的灾难
政府稱湯加海嘯引發 "史無前例的災難
